Hi! I'm a PhD student in Psychiatic genomics at [KI Psychiatric Genomics Institute](https://ki.se/en/meb/ki-psychiatric-genomics-institute). I'm interested in genetics generally, and psychiatric genetics and neuroscience more specifically.
